discussionPoints: Understanding PSUs and how performance affects vesting
Tax implications now that you're in a higher bracket
Balancing short-term goals (house) vs long-term (education fund)
ESPP strategy - max out or reduce?
Building confidence to make informed equity decisions
advisorRecommendation.recommendationText: Let's meet in January to discuss your options. Before then, review the prep checklist I'm sending. Three key questions to think about: 1) How much do you need liquid for the house down payment? 2) What's your risk tolerance with the PSUs? 3) Should we diversify some of those older RSU grants?

timelineEvents.title: January Check-in with Fred
timelineEvents.description: Review prep checklist: house down payment needs, PSU risk tolerance, RSU diversification

timelineEvents.title: PSU Vest: 600 shares
timelineEvents.description: Consider 60/40 split per Fred's guidance. Decide on house down payment allocation.

timelineEvents.title: ESPP Enrollment Decision
timelineEvents.description: Review if continuing max ESPP contribution aligns with savings goals
